short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily toggle search results between Google and Bing! Supports text, image, video, and news searches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily toggle between Google and Bing search results by activating the extension while viewing search results. Fully compatible with text, image, video, and new searches.
When the extension is activated elsewhere it will navigate to your chosen search engine's home page.
